languages.text: "Это священный компилятор, который помогает нам записывать, хранить и в некоторой мере расшифровывать послания. Астропаты получают сообщения в виде запутанных образов и диктуют машине увиденное, а та фиксирует каждое слово. Затем с бобин ресиверов под потолком, по расположенным под полом линиям, через транскриберы записанные машиной слова попадают на ядро-тезаурус. Это важнейшая часть механизма, в которой содержится огромный перечень различных символов и способы их толкования".

traits.locale_text: "Это священный компилятор, который помогает нам записывать, хранить и в некоторой мере расшифровывать послания. Астропаты получают сообщения в виде запутанных образов и диктуют машине увиденное, а та фиксирует каждое слово. Затем с бобин ресиверов под потолком, по расположенным под полом линиям, через транскриберы записанные машиной слова попадают на ядро-тезаурус. Это важнейшая часть механизма, в которой содержится огромный перечень различных символов и способы их толкования".

languages.text: "It is a sacred compiler that helps us record, store, and, to an extent, unriddle messages. The Astropaths first receive these messages in the form of muddled images, dictating what they see to the machine, which logs their every word. From the reels of the receivers on the ceiling, the machine-recorded words are routed through lines under the floor into transcribers and then the thesaurus core. This core is the most important part of the mechanism, as it contains a vast catalogue of various symbols and the methods of their interpretation."
languages.original_text: "Это священный компилятор, который помогает нам записывать, хранить и в некоторой мере расшифровывать послания. Астропаты получают сообщения в виде запутанных образов и диктуют машине увиденное, а та фиксирует каждое слово. Затем с бобин ресиверов под потолком, по расположенным под полом линиям, через транскриберы записанные машиной слова попадают на ядро-тезаурус. Это важнейшая часть механизма, в которой содержится огромный перечень различных символов и способы их толкования".

traits.locale_text: "It is a sacred compiler that helps us record, store, and, to an extent, unriddle messages. The Astropaths first receive these messages in the form of muddled images, dictating what they see to the machine, which logs their every word. From the reels of the receivers under the ceiling, the machine-recorded words are routed through lines under the floor into transcribers and then the thesaurus core. This core is the most important part of the mechanism, as it contains a vast catalogue of various symbols and the methods of their interpretation."

"As the astropaths pick up messages in the warp, they whisper them thoughtlessly to the sacred machine, which records their every word. From the reels of the receivers under the ceiling, the machine-recorded words are routed through lines under the floor into transcribers and then the decoder. Once this mechanism has run the imagery through its censoring filter, it is forwarded to the central cogitator and myself. I weigh up the weight of the words and decide if they are to be imparted to Lady Vigdis and Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

From the reels of the receivers on the ceiling, the machine-recorded words are routed through lines under the floor into transcribers and then the thesaurus core. This core is the most important part of the mechanism, as it contains a vast catalogue of various symbols and the methods of their interpretation."

languages.text: «Es un compilador sagrado que nos ayuda a grabar, almacenar y, hasta cierto punto, resolver mensajes. Primero, los Astrópatas reciben estos mensajes en forma de imágenes diluidas y dicen lo que ven en la imagen a la máquina, mientras que esta última se encarga de registrarlo. Desde las bobinas de los receptores en el techo, las palabras que graba la máquina pasan a través de cables bajo el suelo hasta los transcriptores y, después, al núcleo del tesauro. El núcleo en cuestión es la parte más importante del mecanismo, pues contiene un amplio catálogo de símbolos y las formas que existen de interpretarlos».
languages.original_text: "It is a sacred compiler that helps us record, store, and, to an extent, unriddle messages. The Astropaths first receive these messages in the form of muddled images, dictating what they see to the machine, which logs their every word. From the reels of the receivers on the ceiling, the machine-recorded words are routed through lines under the floor into transcribers and then the thesaurus core. This core is the most important part of the mechanism, as it contains a vast catalogue of various symbols and the methods of their interpretation."

traits.locale_text: «Cuando los Astrópatas reciben mensajes en la disformidad, los susurran automáticamente a la máquina sagrada, que registra cada una de sus palabras. Desde los carretes de receptores bajo el techo, las palabras registradas se envían por cables bajo el suelo hasta los transcriptores y, después, el decodificador. Una vez el mecanismo ha pasado las imágenes por su filtro de censura, el mensaje se envía al cogitador central y a mí mismo. Yo sopeso las palabras y decido si deben comunicarse a la señora Toliman y a mi{mf|lord|lady}».

languages.text: 「それは、私たちがメッセージを記録し、保存し、そしてある程度まで解明を補助する神聖なコンパイラなのです。感応通信官はまず、これらのメッセージを混濁したイメージの形で受け取り、見たものを機械に口述します。 天井の受信機のリールから、機械録音された言葉は床下のラインを通って転写機、そしてシソーラス・コアへと送られます。さまざまな記号やそれらの解釈方法の膨大なカタログが含まれているため、中心部はこの仕組みの最も重要な部分なのです」
languages.original_text: "It is a sacred compiler that helps us record, store, and, to an extent, unriddle messages. The Astropaths first receive these messages in the form of muddled images, dictating what they see to the machine, which logs their every word. From the reels of the receivers on the ceiling, the machine-recorded words are routed through lines under the floor into transcribers and then the thesaurus core. This core is the most important part of the mechanism, as it contains a vast catalogue of various symbols and the methods of their interpretation."

traits.locale_text: 「感応通信官は<歪み>からメッセージを拾い、その言葉を一言一句記録する神聖な機械にささっと囁く。天井下にある受信機のリールから、機械が記録した言葉は床下のラインを通って転写機、そしてデコーダーへと送られる。この流れで検閲フィルターを通過したイメージは、中央の考算機と私自身に転送されるのだ。私はその言葉を吟味し、トリマン女史と陛下にお伝えするべきか決定している」

languages.text: “这是一台神圣的编译器，可以协助我们记录、存储信息，同时在一定程度上对其进行破译。星语者会看到这些信息的模糊图像，他们会将图像内容口述给编译器，而编译器则会忠实记录他们说出的每个字，记录在天花板下面接收器的卷轴上。记录下来的文字会通过地板下方的线路传入转录器，之后再发送给数据核心。数据核心包含了海量的符号与阐释符号的相关数据，也是这台装置最重要的部分。”
languages.original_text: "It is a sacred compiler that helps us record, store, and, to an extent, unriddle messages. The Astropaths first receive these messages in the form of muddled images, dictating what they see to the machine, which logs their every word. From the reels of the receivers on the ceiling, the machine-recorded words are routed through lines under the floor into transcribers and then the thesaurus core. This core is the most important part of the mechanism, as it contains a vast catalogue of various symbols and the methods of their interpretation."

traits.locale_text: “当星语者在亚空间中接收信息时，他们会不加思考地对这台神圣的机器低语，而这台机器则会忠实记录他们说出的每个字，记录在天花板下面接收器的卷轴上。记录下来的文字会通过地板下面的线路传入转录器，之后再发送给解码器。当这台机器对内容进行审查过滤之后，就会把信息转发给中央沉思者和我本人这里。之后，我会斟酌一下内容是否有价值，再决定是否要传达给托里曼女士与大人您。”

languages.text: "Ein heiliger Compiler, der uns hilft, Nachrichten aufzuzeichnen, zu speichern und bis zu einem gewissen Grad zu enträtseln. Die Astropathen erhalten zunächst diese Nachrichten in Gestalt verschwommener Bilder und diktieren das Gesehene in die Maschine, die jedes einzelne Wort aufzeichnet. Von den Walzen der Empfänger an der Decke werden die von der Maschine aufgezeichneten Worte durch Leitungen unter dem Boden in Transkriptoren geschickt, von dort dann zum Thesauruskern. Dieser Kern ist der wichtigste Teil des Mechanismus, da er einen umfassenden Katalog mit verschiedenen Symbolen und Methoden ihrer Interpretation enthält."
languages.original_text: "It is a sacred compiler that helps us record, store, and, to an extent, unriddle messages. The Astropaths first receive these messages in the form of muddled images, dictating what they see to the machine, which logs their every word. From the reels of the receivers on the ceiling, the machine-recorded words are routed through lines under the floor into transcribers and then the thesaurus core. This core is the most important part of the mechanism, as it contains a vast catalogue of various symbols and the methods of their interpretation."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn die Astropathen ihre Nachrichten im Warp holen, flüstern sie ohne nachzudenken vor sich hin, und die heilige Maschine zeichnet jedes ihrer Worte auf. Von den Walzen der Empfänger unter der Decke werden die von der Maschine aufgezeichneten Worte durch Leitungen unter dem Boden in Transkriptoren geschickt, von dort dann zum Decoder. Wenn dieser Mechanismus die Bilder durch seinen Zensurfilter geschickt hat, werden sie zum Hauptcogitator und zu mir weitergeleitet. Ich wäge die Worte ab und entscheiden, ob sie Herrin Toliman und Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} vorgelegt werden sollen."

languages.text: « Il s'agit d'un compilateur sacré, qui nous permet d'enregistrer, de conserver et, dans une certaine mesure, de déchiffrer des messages. Les astropathes reçoivent ces messages sous forme d'images confuses et dictent ce qu'ils voient à la machine, qui enregistre chacune de leurs paroles. À partir des bobines des récepteurs fixés au plafond, les missives ainsi consignées sont retransmises aux transcripteurs puis au noyau synonymique par l'intermédiaire de câbles dissimulés sous le sol. Ce noyau est la partie la plus importante du mécanisme, car il contient un vaste catalogue de symboles et les méthodes permettant de les interpréter. »
languages.original_text: "It is a sacred compiler that helps us record, store, and, to an extent, unriddle messages. The Astropaths first receive these messages in the form of muddled images, dictating what they see to the machine, which logs their every word. From the reels of the receivers on the ceiling, the machine-recorded words are routed through lines under the floor into transcribers and then the thesaurus core. This core is the most important part of the mechanism, as it contains a vast catalogue of various symbols and the methods of their interpretation."

traits.locale_text: « Lorsque les astropathes interceptent des messages dans le Warp, ils les répètent tels quels à la machine sacrée, qui se charge de les enregistrer mot pour mot. À partir des bobines des récepteurs fixés au plafond, les missives ainsi consignées sont retransmises aux transcripteurs puis au décodeur par l'intermédiaire de câbles dissimulés sous le sol. Les images correspondantes sont alors passées au crible du filtre censeur avant d'être transférées au cogitateur central. Je me charge alors d'en analyser la teneur afin de décider s'il convient d'en informer la maîtresse Toliman et Votre Seigneurie. »

languages.text: "Bize mesajları kaydetmede, saklamada ve belli bir noktaya kadar deşifre etmede yardımcı olan kutsal derleyici. Astropatlar, bu mesajları ilk önce karmaşık görüntüler hâlinde alır. Söyledikleri her bir kelimeyi kayda alan makineye gördüklerini dikte ederler. Makineye kaydedilen kelimeler, tavandaki alıcı bobinlerden çıkarak zeminin altındaki hatlar üzerinden kâtiplere, ardından da sözlüğün çekirdeğine yönlendirilir. Bu çekirdek, mekanizmanın en önemli parçasıdır. Çünkü envaiçeşit sembol ve yorum yöntemleriyle dolu muazzam bir katalog içerir."
languages.original_text: "It is a sacred compiler that helps us record, store, and, to an extent, unriddle messages. The Astropaths first receive these messages in the form of muddled images, dictating what they see to the machine, which logs their every word. From the reels of the receivers on the ceiling, the machine-recorded words are routed through lines under the floor into transcribers and then the thesaurus core. This core is the most important part of the mechanism, as it contains a vast catalogue of various symbols and the methods of their interpretation."
